intro: Weinmannia tondusii, commonly known as the Tondusii weinmannia, is a shrub or small tree native to the coastal regions of southern California and Baja California. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant has silvery-gray foliage with small, oval-shaped leaves that are covered in fine, white hairs.
